title: [1.7.X][SuperEnchants——超级附魔][永久更新][HAYOStudio]
author: csj3120
txt_content:
本帖最后由 没糖的葫芦 于 2018-7-30 22:08 编辑 

超级附魔Mod
相信不少人都听说过这个MOD，但他的原作者felixmc弃坑了，现在他被另一个叫Twinklez的人接了
使用方法
① 用附魔台附魔（Lv30几率最高）时有几率得到此Mod提供的高级附魔
② 使用附魔书图片: 
 
 -锐利等级增加至10 [X]
-火焰伤害等级增加至10 [X]
-洗劫等级增加至5 [V]
-击退等级增加至5 [V]


-效率等级增加至10 [X]
-耐久等级增加至10 [X]
-时运增加至5 [V]


-保护等级增加至10 [X]
-抛射物保护等级增加至10 [X]
-爆炸保护等级增加至10 [X]
-坠落保护等级增加至10 [X]
-荆棘等级增加至5 [V]


-力量等级增加至10 [X]
-重击等级增加至5   [V]
*0.4及以上适用于1.7.x-1.8,如有错误请反馈
老版本

replies.author: Z_zyMC
replies.txt_content: 图在哪里？

This mod requires Minecraft Forge [Recommended: 10.12.0.977 or above] 

Tip: Get the auto-installer (if you don't have Forge yet) it makes it so you don't have to manually install it! :D

Hey everyone, Twinklez here. I will be working on a mod called SuperEnchants that 'felixmc' has handed over to me, because he is retiring. *feel bad for him*

Proof:http://www.planetminecraft.com/blog/felixmcs-mod-giveaway/ 

SuperEnchants mod allows you to enchant tools that have high levels. Note that you will need 30 levels and a enchanting table with maxed out levels. The higher the level you use to enchant, the luckier you will get. Enchanting something next to lvl 10 will lead to NEAR impossible.. :)

Enchantments that their limits have been increased or changed: 

Sharpness Levels up to 10 [X] 
Fire Aspect Levels up to 10 [X] 
Looting Levels up to 5 [V] 
Knockback Levels up to 5 [V] 

Efficiency Levels up to 10 [X] 
Unbreaking Levels up to 10 [X] 
Fortune Levels up to 5 [V] 

Protection Levels up to 10 [X] 
Projectile Protection Levels up to 10 [X] 
Blast Protection Levels up to 10 [X] 
Feather Falling Levels up to 10 [X] 
Thorns Levels up to 5 [V] 

Power Levels up to 10 [X] 
Punch Levels up to 5 [V]

以上是我从原帖搬过来的英文，
大概就是
锋利等级上限改为10
火焰附加等级上限改为10
抢夺等级上限改为5
击退等级上限改为5

效率等级上限改为10
耐久等级上限改为10
时运等级上限改为5

保护、摔落保护、爆炸保护、弹射物保护、等级上限改为10
荆棘等级上限改为5

力量等级上限改为10
冲击等级上限改为5
